question.text:
Match the following correctly.
 
a. Pineal i. Epinephrine
b. Thyroid ii. Melatonin
c. Ovary iii. Estrogen
d. Adrenal medulla iv. Tetraiodothyroxine

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text: Pineal gland situated in the brain secretes melatonin helping with the sleeping cycle. Ovary, along with been the female reproductive organ, secretes estrogen - the female sex hormone. Tetra-iodothyroxine is secreted by the largest endocrine gland, thyroid. Epinephrine produced by adrenal medulla part of adrenal.
